extendedInfo.description: Hereâs your mainline connection to dioguardi.ca and all things tax.Download the app and instantly:- Scan and upload receipts straight to your MyDIOTAXâ¢ file- Click-to-call DioGuardiÂ® to get help with a tax problem- Rate your tax problem on a 1 to 10 scale- Watch our newest videos and play Tax Fun Games- Locate the nearest DioGuardiÂ® office

reviews.title: Nice working app
reviews.comment: We saw the great DioGuardi billboards around with the App mentioned.. What a great idea. Being able to connect to your account while being mobile! The scanning of the documents is a great feature as is the updates on the Video and Blog area. The FIND A LOCATION works very well and it\'s easy to find the closest office. I am sure I will be using this while out at the Restaurants after my bill comes in.
reviews.author: A Google User
